effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area. Hit
Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user stomps down on the ground
and attacks everything in the area. Hit
Pokémon’s Speed stat is reduced.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user strikes everything around it by stomping
down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of
those hit.
